meanings.definition: Not seized or taken hold of
meanings.sent1: The unseized toy lay untouched on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The unseized opportunity slipped away unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: The unseized cookie tempted the hungry child.
meanings.sent4: Her unseized dreams soared freely in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unseized balloon floated aimlessly in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The unseized butterfly fluttered away from the net.
meanings.sent2: The unseized thief vanished into the night.
meanings.sent3: The unseized idea danced just out of reach.
meanings.sent4: His unseized thoughts raced like wild horses.
meanings.sent5: The unseized bird soared high above the trees.

meanings.sent1: The unseized river flowed freely through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The unseized laughter echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent3: The unseized horse galloped joyfully in the field.
meanings.sent4: Her unseized emotions bubbled to the surface.
meanings.sent5: The unseized wind carried the scent of flowers.
